headline: FIGS: Opportunistic Bid Grossly Undervalues A Recession Proof Business
summary: FIGS' stock drop presents an arbitrage opportunity for investors, as a PE fund's undervalued offer stirs up the potential for profit. See why FIGS is a Buy.

headline: 3 Must-Know Facts About Lululemon Before Buying the Stock
summary: Lululemon Athletica (NASDAQ: LULU) has risen up the ranks and successfully carved out a niche in the competitive apparel sector.  The consumer discretionary stock got a boost recently after management reported better-than-expected financial results for the third quarter.  You might be considering adding a position in Lululemon.
